review.reviewBody: Good basic North American style "Chinese" Food (Having dated ladies from Taiwan and the Mainland, I got to try real home made Chinese food.  Would believe that chicken feet are actually pretty good?) .  The three selection meal for one option is good, plentiful, tasty and value for money.
Been ordering here for years! Chow mein is delish, Szechuan eggplant is really good too. Food is always fresh and good portions
The food was so fresh and hot when it arrived! It was delicious.
the best Chinese food in the GVRD, Average $$$ Great service and friendly staff 👌

This was my first time eating here and the food was delicious! So fresh! We were actually blown away because it was so tasty and all the veggies were to their color. We will definitely be ordering again from them the next time we have our craving for some delicious Chinese food!
